title: PM discusses COVID-19 situation with health aides
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 31 (APP): Special Assistant to PM on Health Dr Faisal Sultan and Health Minister of Punjab Dr Yasmeen Rashid and called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Monday.
The situation of coronavirus cases in the country and the governmentâ€™s strategy in this regard came under discussion.
